detail_desc: Jacket in woven fabric with a mesh-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, a stand-up collar and zip down the front. One chest pocket, zipped side pockets, a loose yoke at the back with a mesh section underneath and elastication at the cuffs and hems. Unlined.

Jacket in woven fabric with a mesh-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, a stand-up collar and zip down the front. One chest pocket, zipped side pockets, a loose yoke at the back with a mesh section underneath and elastication at the cuffs and hems. Unlined.
Dress in a slub-knit cotton blend with short raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a braided tie belt with glittery threads and a rounded hem. Brushed inside.
Dress in a slub-knit cotton blend with short raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a braided tie belt with glittery threads and a rounded hem. Brushed inside.

Off-the-shoulder playsuit in a soft, patterned viscose weave with elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, side pockets and short legs. Lined.
Sleeveless, A-line dress in airy, patterned chiffon with narrow, braided shoulder straps and a braided trim around the neckline and armholes. The dress lining is made from recycled polyester.

Platform shoes in imitation patent leather with closed lacing at the front and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles. Platform front approx 3 cm, heel approx 5.5 cm.

Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top and reflective details. Ventilating mesh panel down the back, a zipped back pocket and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is partly recycled.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is partly recycled.

Dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif at the top, long sleeves, twisted seams at the front and side pockets. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside. The dress is made partly from recycled cotton.
Hat in soft, fine-knit wool with a roll-edge hem.
Hat in soft, fine-knit wool with a roll-edge hem.

Running jacket in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with reflective details and a brushed thermal inside. Hood with an elasticated drawstring, stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip, and a zipped key pocket at the back. Ventilating holes under the arms and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Size of key pocket 11x18 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is partly recycled.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is partly recycled.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist and legs with stripes down the sides and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the joggers is partly recycled.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and legs with contrasting colour side stripes and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and legs with contrasting colour side stripes and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Coat in woven fabric containing some wool with a high stand-up collar with buttons, a diagonal zip at the front, side pockets and one inner pocket. Lined.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, diagonal zip down the front and welt side pockets. Lined.
Short coat in a woven wool blend with a high stand-up collar with press-studs and a concealed zip down the front. Zipped side pockets. Lined.
Short coat in a woven wool blend with a high stand-up collar with press-studs and a concealed zip down the front. Zipped side pockets. Lined.
Short coat in a woven wool blend with a high stand-up collar with press-studs and a concealed zip down the front. Zipped side pockets. Lined.
Short coat in a woven wool blend with a high stand-up collar with press-studs and a concealed zip down the front. Zipped side pockets. Lined.
Double-breasted coat in a felted wool blend with wide notch lapels, concealed fastening at the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Knee-length coat in a felted wool blend with notch lapels, a tie belt at the waist and patch front pockets. Lined.
Short jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, side pockets and elastication at the back of the hem. Lined.
Short jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, side pockets and elastication at the back of the hem. Lined.

Fitted coat in a soft wool blend with notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Adjustable tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.

Fitted coat in a soft wool blend with notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Adjustable tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Short coat in a felted wool blend with a faux fur collar, buttons at the front, side pockets and a pleat at the back. Lined.
Blouse in airy satin with a lace yoke, sewn in wrapover at the front and a V-neck with a concealed button. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Blouse in airy satin with a lace yoke, sewn in wrapover at the front and a V-neck with a concealed button. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Blouse in airy satin with a lace yoke, sewn in wrapover at the front and a V-neck with a concealed button. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist.
V-neck body in a double layer of satin with a lace trim at the top, seam at the hips with a jersey lower section and press-studs at the crotch.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a sheen. Small frilled collar, short, wide raglan sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a sheen. Small frilled collar, short, wide raglan sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.

Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Opening and covered button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back, and a seam at the waist with pleats. Partly lined.

Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Opening and covered button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back, and a seam at the waist with pleats. Partly lined.
One-button jacket in a jacquard weave with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Trousers in a jacquard weave with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and straight legs with creases.
Gently fitted, long-sleeved, V-neck dress in viscose satin with sheer chiffon.
Gently fitted, long-sleeved, V-neck dress in viscose satin with sheer chiffon.
Bolero in soft faux fur with cap sleeves and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top. Lined.
Bolero in soft faux fur with cap sleeves and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top. Lined.

Long dress in lace with a deep, scallop-edged V-neck at the back and long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs. Concealed zip and covered buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Long dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Silicone trim at the top, support panels in the bodice and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist and an asymmetric, draped skirt. Partly lined.

Long bandeau dress in lace with covered buttons, a concealed zip and hook and eye fastener at the back. Silicone trim and support panels at the top, a seam at the waist with concealed, adjustable elastication, and a heavily draping skirt. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with short sleeves and a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with short sleeves and a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with short sleeves and a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with short sleeves and a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Sports top in sturdy jersey with a flock print on the front and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Longer and rounded at the front.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying, jacquard-patterned, functional fabric with a wide racer back. Seamless.

T-shirt dress in hard washed jersey made from a soft viscose and cotton blend with a wide neckline, short sleeves and twisted ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Visible seam centre back and a rounded hem.

T-shirt dress in hard washed jersey made from a soft viscose and cotton blend with a wide neckline, short sleeves and twisted ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Visible seam centre back and a rounded hem.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with short sleeves and a print motif on the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with short sleeves and a print motif on the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with short sleeves and a print motif on the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and bottoms in soft, printed cotton jersey. T-shirt with a rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and bottoms in soft, printed cotton jersey. T-shirt with a rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a V-neck and gently rounded hem.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft wool jersey with an elasticated waist.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft wool jersey with an elasticated waist.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved bodysuit in wool with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved bodysuit in wool with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
All-in-one pyjamas in patterned stretch cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
All-in-one pyjamas in patterned stretch cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
All-in-one pyjamas in patterned stretch cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
All-in-one pyjamas in patterned stretch cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
All-in-one pyjamas in patterned stretch cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Coat in soft faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.

Long, warm-lined jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and an adjustable tab and button at the sides of the hem. Pile lining.
Longer, straight-cut jacket in a softly draping weave with a sheen. Notch lapels, a concealed double-breasted fastening at the front, tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides.
Cropped top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
